name: pico8-pong
description:
My version of Pong for PICO-8.

 A lot of tricks picked up from LazyGameDevs Let's Make Breakout Series. Highly recommended, learnt a lot of stuff from that series.

Use arrow keys to move. First to 3 points wins, then game resets.

 The AI can be a bit wonky, but overall pretty satisfied with it.
